name: Summer Rose
description:
Set during the last week of school before summer vacation, this short-and-sweet yuri VN follows high school senior Rose as she begins an exciting new relationship. 

Choose from four potential partners and plotlines. There's upbeat best friend Nina, charismatic guitarist Katey, shy valedictorian Molly, and dominant bully Gwen.

Progression

Nina Path: The story and the initial art for this plotline is complete, though a second character set for Nina is in production. More might be added on further down the road though.

Katey Path: The story is largely done, but several of the illustrations are still in the works and I plan on adding a second character set for Katey. It leaves off on Friday and will be continued in the next update.

Molly Path: Everything but the ending is written and programmed. Some of the art is missing and the first illustration is being worked on, so the sketch is being used as a placeholder for now. It leaves off on Saturday and will be continued in the next update.

Gwen Path: Most of the story is written, but none of the illustrations are done. Her plotline will be available in future updates.

Featuring Art by:

Akachi.ix | de_ijal | indracgunawans | lunalinxi | syaviray | morinouzen | awang
